attributes.action: Order the MOD to track veterans and include them in the statistics reporting suicides following service in Afghanistan.
attributes.additional_details: It is obvious that the people of this land are, once again, being lied to by a government department operating a cover up.  At the very least the names of civil servants and army officers perpetrating the cover up should be retained in perpetuity so that in due time, when politicians of this land grow some balls, they can be called to account and be held responsible by our courts for their criminal activity.
